00175 inline
00176 QtArgCmdLine::QtArgCmdLine()
00177     :   m_context( QCoreApplication::arguments() )
00178     ,   m_delimiter( defaultDelimiter )
00179 {
00180     // Skip program name.
00181     m_context.next();
00182 }

00193 inline
00194 QtArgCmdLine::QtArgCmdLine( int argc, char ** argv )
00195     :   m_context( QStringList() )
00196     ,   m_delimiter( defaultDelimiter )
00197 {
00198     QStringList tmp;
00199 
00200     if( argc > 1 )
00201     {
00202         for( int i = 1; i < argc; ++i )
00203             tmp.append( QString::fromLocal8Bit( argv[ i ] ) );
00204     }
00205 
00206     m_context = QtArgCmdLineContext( tmp );
00207 }

00244 inline void
00245 QtArgCmdLine::parse( bool parseAfterIgnoreRest )
00246 {
00247     checkArgumentsCorrectness();
00248 
00249     QString lastArgNameOrFlag;
00250 
00251     while( !m_context.atEnd() )
00252     {
00253         const QString & arg = m_context.next();
00254         QString name, nameWithoutDelims;
00255 
00256         {
00257             QString value;
00258 
00259             splitArgumentAndValue( arg, name, value );
00260 
00261             nameWithoutDelims = removeDelimiters( name );
00262 
00263             if( !value.isNull() )
00264                 m_context.prepend( value );
00265         }
00266 
00267         // Argument.
00268 
00269         if( isArgument( arg ) )
00270         {
00271             if( nameWithoutDelims.isEmpty() )
00272             {
00273                 if( !parseAfterIgnoreRest )
00274                     return;
00275                 else
00276                     continue;
00277             }
00278 
00279             QtArgIface * argument = findArgument( nameWithoutDelims );
00280             lastArgNameOrFlag = name;
00281 
00282             if( argument != NULL )
00283             {
00284                 argument->process( m_context );
00285                 argument->visit( m_context );
00286                 argument->checkConstraint();
00287             }
00288             else
00289                 throw QtArgUnknownArgumentEx(
00290                     QString::fromLatin1( "Unknown argument: %1" )
00291                         .arg( name ) );
00292         }
00293 
00294         // Flag.
00295 
00296         else if( isFlag( arg ) )
00297         {
00298             for( int i = 0, i_max = nameWithoutDelims.length() - 1;
00299                 i <= i_max; ++i )
00300             {
00301                 QtArgIface * argument = findArgument( nameWithoutDelims[ i ] );
00302                 lastArgNameOrFlag = QString( m_delimiter )
00303                     + nameWithoutDelims[ i ];
00304 
00305                 if( i != i_max )
00306                 {
00307                     QStringList dummyArgsList( nameWithoutDelims
00308                         .right( nameWithoutDelims.length() - i - 1 ) );
00309                     QtArgCmdLineContext dummyContext( dummyArgsList );
00310 
00311                     if( argument->process( dummyContext ) )
00312                     {
00313                         argument->visit( m_context );
00314                         argument->checkConstraint();
00315 
00316                         break;
00317                     }
00318                 }
00319                 else
00320                     argument->process( m_context );
00321 
00322                 argument->visit( m_context );
00323                 argument->checkConstraint();
00324             }
00325         }
00326 
00327         // Something unexpected.
00328 
00329         else
00330             throw QtArgUnexpectedOptionEx(
00331                 QString::fromLatin1( "Unexpected option: %1. "
00332                     "Argument \"%2\" doesn't expect any values." )
00333                         .arg( name ).arg( lastArgNameOrFlag ) );
00334     }
00335 
00336     checkMandatoryArguments();
00337 }
00338 
00339 inline void
00340 QtArgCmdLine::addArgImpl( QtArgIface * arg )
00341 {
00342     if( !m_args.contains( arg ) )
00343     {
00344         m_args.append( arg );
00345 
00346         checkArgumentsCorrectness();
00347     }
00348 }
00349 
00350 inline void
00351 QtArgCmdLine::checkArgumentsCorrectness() const
00352 {
00353     QtArgIface::FlagsList flags;
00354     QtArgIface::NamesList names;
00355 
00356     foreach( QtArgIface * arg, m_args )
00357         arg->check( m_delimiter, flags, names );
00358 }

00360 inline bool
00361 QtArgCmdLine::isFlag( const QString & str ) const
00362 {
00363     if( !isArgument( str ) )
00364         if( str.startsWith( m_delimiter ) )
00365             return true;
00366 
00367     return false;
00368 }
00369 
00370 inline bool
00371 QtArgCmdLine::isArgument( const QString & str ) const
00372 {
00373     static const QString doubleDelimiter =
00374         QString( m_delimiter ) + m_delimiter;
00375 
00376     if( str.startsWith( doubleDelimiter ) )
00377         return true;
00378 
00379     return false;
00380 }
00381 
00382 inline void
00383 QtArgCmdLine::splitArgumentAndValue( const QString & toCheck,
00384     QString & argument, QString & value )
00385 {
00386     const int index = toCheck.indexOf( QLatin1Char( '=' ) );
00387 
00388     if( index != -1 )
00389     {
00390         argument = toCheck.left( index );
00391         value = toCheck.right( toCheck.length() - index - 1 );
00392     }
00393     else
00394     {
00395         argument = toCheck;
00396         value = QString::null;
00397     }
00398 }

00400 inline QString
00401 QtArgCmdLine::removeDelimiters( const QString & str ) const
00402 {
00403     QString tmp = str;
00404 
00405     if( tmp.startsWith( m_delimiter ) )
00406         tmp.remove( 0, 1 );
00407 
00408     if( tmp.startsWith( m_delimiter ) )
00409         tmp.remove( 0, 1 );
00410 
00411     return tmp;
00412 }

00414 inline QtArgIface *
00415 QtArgCmdLine::findArgument( const QString & name )
00416 {
00417     QtArgIface * ret = NULL;
00418 
00419     foreach( QtArgIface * arg, m_args )
00420     {
00421         QtArgIface * a = arg->giveArgument( name );
00422 
00423         if( a && a->names().contains( name ) )
00424         {
00425             ret = a;
00426             break;
00427         }
00428 
00429         if( ret == NULL )
00430             ret = a;
00431         else if( a )
00432             throw QtArgUnknownArgumentEx(
00433                 QString::fromLatin1( "Unknown argument: %1%1%2" )
00434                     .arg( m_delimiter )
00435                     .arg( name ) );
00436     }
00437 
00438     if( ret == NULL )
00439         throw QtArgUnknownArgumentEx(
00440             QString::fromLatin1( "Unknown argument: %1%1%2" )
00441                 .arg( m_delimiter )
00442                 .arg( name ) );
00443 
00444     return ret;
00445 }
00446 
00447 inline QtArgIface *
00448 QtArgCmdLine::findArgument( const QChar & flag )
00449 {
00450     foreach( QtArgIface * arg, m_args )
00451     {
00452         QtArgIface * ret = arg->giveArgument( flag );
00453 
00454         if( ret != NULL )
00455             return ret;
00456     }
00457 
00458     throw QtArgUnknownArgumentEx(
00459         QString::fromLatin1( "Unknown argument: %1%2" )
00460             .arg( m_delimiter )
00461             .arg( flag ) );
00462 }

00464 inline void
00465 QtArgCmdLine::checkMandatoryArguments() const
00466 {
00467     foreach( const QtArgIface * arg, m_args )
00468         arg->check();
00469 }
